title: Traditional Christmas fruit cake
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons brandy', '675g (1 1/2lb) mixed dried fruit', '225g (8oz) butter', 'Grated rind of 1 orange or lemon', '225g (8oz) soft brown sugar', '1 tablespoon treacle', '4 eggs', '280g (10oz) plain flour', '1 rounded teaspoon baking powder', '1 rounded teaspoon mixed spice', 'Large pinch salt', '50 to 100g (2 to 4oz) glace cherries', '100g (4oz) chopped mixed peel', '50g (2oz) chopped nuts', '1/2 teaspoon almond essence']
